question: How to create a Virginia's Insurance Marketplace account?
text:
How to create a Virginia's Insurance Marketplace account?
          
        
(Desplazarse hacia abajo para ver Preguntas Ms Frecuentes en Espaol)
In order to enroll in coverage through Virginia's Insurance Marketplace, you need to create an account.
How to create your account on Virginia's Insurance Marketplace:

Go to the
Virginia's Insurance Marketplace
website. On the homepage click on the yellow box button at the top right-hand corner of the home page: Get Covered
After clicking Get Covered you will land on the account creation/account login screen.  It will give you Three ( 3 ) options.  The first option is the top rectangle Browse for Health and Dental Plans
If you have never applied for health coverage through a Marketplace and this is your first time attempting to apply for coverage on any exchange, this where your Virginia's Insurance Marketplace journey begins.  Click on the Browse for health and dental plans button, followed by clicking on the continue button after reviewing the Virginia's Insurance Marketplace Plan Comparison Tool information, and then the Skip and Sign-Up button to create your new individual account on Virginia's Insurance Marketplace.
Enter the required information on the next screen to set up your Virginia's Insurance Marketplace account.
NOTE:
Be sure that you are entering an email address and Social Security Number that are unique (not associated with another Virginia's Insurance Marketplace account). You will not be able to set up a Virginia's Insurance Marketplace account if you enter a previously used email address or Social Security Number.
Be careful when selecting a security question.
NOTE:
If you forget your password, you'll need to know the answer to your security question to access your account. If you can't remember the answer, you will have to contact Tech Support to get back into the account.
After you're done filling out the required information, be sure to agree to the Privacy Policy and click
Submit
.

Fill out the required information regarding communication preferences. Be sure to choose whether you'd like to receive information by mail or email, or both.
If you'd like to receive your 1095-A tax form electronically, check the box and click
Continue
. If not, just click
Continue.

Note: If you had an active application through healthcare.gov and received a notice from Virginia's Insurance Marketplace with your unique access code, you should click on the second option Register with access code to claim your pre-loaded Virginia's Insurance Marketplace account. See Using an access code to claim your account for more information.
_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________
A fin de inscribirse en una cobertura a travs de Virginia's Insurance Marketplace, debe crear una cuenta.
Cmo crear su cuenta en Virginia's Insurance Marketplace:

Ingrese al sitio web www.marketplace.virginia.gov. En la pgina de inicio de Virginia's Insurance Marketplace haga clic en el botn del casillero amarillo en la parte superior derecha de la pgina de inicio: Get Covered (Obtener cobertura)
Luego de hacer clic en Get Coveredser dirigido a la pantalla de creacin de cuenta/inicio de sesin.  Le dar tres (3) opciones.  La primera opcin es el rectngulo superior Browse for Health and Dental Plans (Buscar planes mdicos y dentales).
Si nunca ha solicitado cobertura mdica a travs de un mercado y esta es su primera vez intentando solicitar cobertura en cualquier intercambio, aqu comienza su trayecto con Virginia's Insurance Marketplace.  Haga clic en el botn Browse for health and dental plans, y luego haga clic en el botn Continue (Continuar) luego de revisar la informacin de la Herramienta de comparacin del Plan Virginia's Insurance Marketplace, y luego en el botn Skip and Sign Up (Saltear e Inscribirse) para crear su nueva cuenta individual en Virginia's Insurance Marketplace.
Ingrese la informacin requerida en la siguiente pantalla para configurar su cuenta Virginia's Insurance Marketplace.
NOTA:
Asegrese de ingresar una direccin de correo electrnico y un nmero de seguro social que sean nicos (no asociados con otra cuenta Virginia's Insurance Marketplace). No podr configurar una cuenta Virginia's Insurance Marketplace si ingresa una direccin de correo electrnico o un nmero de seguro social utilizado previamente.
Tenga precaucin al seleccionar una pregunta de seguridad.
NOTA:
Si olvida su contrasea, deber saber la respuesta a su pregunta de seguridad para acceder a su cuenta. Si no puede recordar la respuesta, deber contactar a Soporte tcnico para poder ingresar a su cuenta.
Luego de haber completado toda la informacin solicitada, asegrese de aceptar la Poltica de Privacidad y haga clic en
Submit
(Enviar).

Complete la informacin solicitada respecto de las preferencias de comunicacin. Asegrese de elegir si desea recibir informacin por correo o correo electrnico, o ambos.
Si desea recibir su formulario impositivo 1095-A de forma electrnica, marque el casillero y haga clic en
Continue (continuar)
. Si no, solo haga clic en
Continue.

Nota: Si tiene una solicitud activa mediante healthcare.gov, y recibi una notificacin de Virginia's Insurance Marketplace con su cdigo de acceso nico, debera hacer clic en la segunda opcin Register with access code (Registrarse con cdigo de acceso) para reclamar su cuenta Virginia's Insurance Marketplace precargada. Consulte Using an access code to claim your account (Usar un cdigo de acceso para reclamar su cuenta) para ms informacin.
